attributes.action: take active steps to prevent Joe Emery from being allowed to re-enter the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Joseph Emery, of Upminster, Essex, is a dangerous sex offender.  I petition the Prime Minister to prevent him from re-entering the UK.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
